list_by_account.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_account_id, {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'to': doc.to_number, 'from': doc.from_number, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }

list_by_faxbox.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.faxbox_id, {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'to': doc.to_number, 'from': doc.from_number, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }

list_by_account_folder.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc.folder], {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'to': doc.to_number, 'from': doc.from_number, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }

list_by_faxbox_folder.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.faxbox_id, doc.folder], {'id': doc._id, 'status': doc.pvt_job_status, 'to': doc.to_number, 'from': doc.from_number, 'created': doc.pvt_created}); }
